requirement.title: GPS Sensor
requirement.description: The FCP shall be equipped with a GPS sensor.

requirement.title: Cellular Module
requirement.description: The FCP shall be equipped with a transceiver for cellular communication.

requirement.title: FCP-FC Interface
requirement.description: The FCP shall be equipped with an interface to send and receive data to the FC

requirement.title: FCP-NAV Interface
requirement.description: The FCP shall be equipped with an interface to receive data from the NAV

requirement.title: FCP-PDB Interface
requirement.description: The FCP shall be equipped with an interface to receive data from the PDB
